verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Majestic sweetness sits enthroned, newline Upon the Savior's brow; newline His head with radiant glories crowned, newline His lips with grace o'erflow, newline His lips with grace o'erflow.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: No mortal can with Him compare newline Among the sons of men; newline Fairer is He than all the fair newline Who fill the heav'nly train, newline Who fill the heav'nly train.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He saw me plunged in deep distress, newline He flew to my relief; newline For me He bore the shameful Cross, newline And carried all my grief, newline And carried all my grief.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: To Him I owe my life and breath newline And all the joys I have; newline He makes me triumph over death, newline And saves me from the grave, newline And saves me from the grave.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Since from His bounty I receive newline Such proofs of love divine, newline Had I a thousand hearts to give, newline Lord they should all be Thine; newline Lord they should all be Thine.
